title: Exercise: Build Dynamic Workflows with a Multi-Dataset SchemaScanner

questions.question: Which outcome will occur if you read multiple input datasets and then use the SchemaScanner with default settings to supply a single schema to a dynamic writer?
options: The output will only include attributes present in all the source datasets.
The output will only include attributes defined on the reader feature type.
The output will include all the attributes present in the source datasets except format and FME attributes.
The output will include all the attributes present in the source datasets.

questions.question: Which attribute tells the dynamic writer which schema feature to use when it receives multiple schema features (Schema Definition Name)?
What type does MarketType have for the Thursday schema if you set Empty Attributes to Use Default Data Type?
